Label: The Question
Description: This card reflects the core of your conundrum. It represents the seeker and the singular energy surrounding the current situation.

Label: The Pious Path
Description: What one ought to do. This sister represents the light, the virtuous action, and the direction that leads to growth and peace.

Label: The Devilish Path
Description: What one ought to avoid. This sister warns of temptations, stagnant energies, or actions that will lead the seeker into darker lands.

Label: The Shadow of the Past
Description: The spy who looks behind. This position reveals the roots of the situation and the events that have already left their mark on your soul.

Label: The Eye of the Present
Description: The spy who watches the now. This card reveals hidden movements and truths occurring in your life right this moment that you might not yet see.

Label: The Fog of the Future
Description: The spy who gazes ahead. This card shows the most likely manifestation of your current path and what is currently forming in the mists of tomorrow.

Label: The Lord of the Body
Description: Governs the physical realm. This card speaks to your health, your home, your finances, and your tangible impact on the world.

Label: The Lord of the Mind
Description: Governs logic and communication. This card reflects your thoughts, your plans, and the mental clarity (or confusion) you currently possess.

Label: The Lord of the Spirit
Description: Governs the ethereal reach. This card shows your connection to the divine, your intuition, and your higher purpose.

Label: The Lord of the Subconscious
Description: Governs the mysterious depths. This card reveals the hidden drives, dreams, and suppressed emotions that influence you from the shadows.
